entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 11:54 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -22.9°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
